backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with data types, storage maps, authorization mixin, and CRUD-style functions for packages, designers, briefs, consultations, notes, user profiles, and product categories.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic that adds a new productCategories map to existing actor state, copying forward all other stored fields.
feature_evidence.json: Describes implemented features, affected frontend files, components used, and linked requirements for product category browsing and related navigation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists prewritten summaries for many frontend files including routing, components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that initializes the app root and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, global providers, and page components including product category listing and detail pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter basic details and saves the profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Consul: Form allowing logged‑in users to submit a consultation request with date, notes, and generated request metadata.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper including header, footer, and the profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/navigation/SiteF: Footer displaying branding, navigation links, social icons, locations, and a dynamic copyright.
frontend/src/components/navigation/SiteH: Header with navigation links, authentication controls, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hook to fetch the current user's profile using the actor, exposing loading and fetched state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hook for handling Internet Identity auth flow, storing identity, and managing login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as packages, designers, project briefs, consultations, notes, and user profiles using an actor instance.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch the caller's user role and admin status from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines light and dark theme CSS variables for colors, borders, and UI elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardPa: Loads and displays the user’s project briefs with status and links to details, plus an option to start a new project.
frontend/src/pages/DesignerDetailPage.ts: Displays detailed information for a selected designer, including bio, styles, and portfolio images, with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/DesignersPage.tsx: Shows a searchable and filterable list of designers using style and text filters with data loaded from useGetDesigners().
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Renders a FAQ page with an accordion listing common questions and answers about the service.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with hero content, feature highlights, and navigation actions based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Renders a multi-step explanation of the platform’s design process using static content and stylized sections.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a 404 error page with a message and a button linking back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/Onboarding: Implements a four-step onboarding quiz for room type, styles, budget, and timeline, saving answers to state and navigating to review.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/ProjectBri: Shows a review of collected onboarding data and submits a project brief, handling authentication and success confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/PackagesPage.tsx: Fetches and displays design packages with pricing and features, allowing users to select a package and continue onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/products/ProductCateg: Fetches and displays product categories with loading, error, empty, and success states, including category sorting and image selection logic.
Loads a specific category and its products, handling loading, errors, missing categories, and rendering a product grid.
frontend/src/pages/projects/ProjectWorks: Displays a project workspace showing brief and notes, with ability to add notes and handle loading or missing-project states.
frontend/src/routes/RequireAuth.tsx: Guards routes by checking authentication and showing a sign‑in prompt or loading state if not authenticated.
frontend/src/state/onboardingStore.ts: Zustand store managing onboarding selections like room type, styles, budget, timeline, and selected package.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting INR currency and converting bigint timestamps into readable dates or date‑times.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, required images, and a list of implemented features for building the Indian interior‑design site sajavathub.com. Primarily serves as a versioned specification and progress record.
